mapper.insert: insert into ahzit_member( member_no, member_ahzit_no, member_id, member_joindate, member_nick ) values ( ahzit_member_seq.nextval, #{memberAhzitNo}, #{memberId}, sysdate, #{memberNick} )
insert into ahzit_member( member_no, member_ahzit_no, member_id, member_joindate, member_nick ) values ( #{memberNo}, #{memberAhzitNo}, #{memberId}, sysdate, #{memberNick} )
